findings.reasoning: This finding correctly identifies the critical vulnerability in the verifyHeaderAndExecuteTx function where the contract calls any function on any contract without validation.
While this finding is related to the target vulnerability, it does not fully capture the root cause of the access control issue.
This finding is related to the target vulnerability but does not address the core issue of unprotected function calls.
